title: ''just have better reaction time then rengar''
body:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yW_st2H2Y2Y

nearly perfect reaction time, still got rekt cuz entire burst is in 0.01 second

''but, just get like tahm to eat the adc''

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YHab82mY39s

yeah ain't no match for 0.01 second

''but just get a pink ward''

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=twEpW-aA9yU

have fun reacting to 1000 ms rengar

no I know what you're going to say ''but talon, but leblanc''

leblanc her burst has travel time, unlike that of rengar

talon has to use ult prematurely if he wants to go to their adc safely wasting damage, and even then you can probably still spot him, not to mention his stealth doesn't last as long as that of rengar making it less threathening.


all of this wouldn't be as big of a problem if we still had pink ward trinket and sweeper trinket which could detect stealth instead of merely showing the adc's imminent demise.

late game this becomes even worse, and don't give me your ''but late game rarely happens so it shouldn't be a problem'' that's a shitty reason, that's like giving a champion +1000armor, mr and health once the game passes the 60 minute mark, sure it rarely happens but when it does it sure is frustrating.

what also makes this a big problem is rengar his ms, mid/late game he has so much ms that by the time you see the ! above your head he's already on top of you.

I honestly can't think of any changes to him without making him either UP or OP, that's how rengar his kit is and why he needs a rework

replies.body:
Take a look at that game.  That rengar is full build, WITH an elixir at 35 minutes.  If you gave that kind of shit to an orianna you would've lost too unless she sucks.  It might feel less painful, but the same thing would've happened.

If Rengar really did have zero counterplay, he would be literally spammed in the LCS.  Why isn't he?  His laning relies on cheese strats and leaves him extremely vulnerable to ganks, his jungling is subpar and is only sort of reliable at level 6, and even then vi is a much more reliable champ.

Bring back trinkets and sweepers, but that's about it.

> [{quoted}](name=UltraScept,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=6AiNRqv8,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2015-12-30T18:41:31.472+0000)
>
> If Rengar really did have zero counterplay, he would be literally spammed in the LCS.  Why isn't he?

Because LCS isn't on right now.

Do you know how long Rengar has had his current oneshot kit?

Two years.

How many times have you seen that shit being played in the LCS, LCK, or LPL?
How about: How many times has he won in the championship?

> [{quoted}](name=DeceasedL0ved0ne,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=6AiNRqv8,comment-id=0006000000000001,timestamp=2015-12-30T21:31:00.781+0000)
>

I would argue with your logic, but I checked if it was worth it to argue. Turns out you're silver.

I just saved a lot of time.

You're low plat 5, which is basically gold. Get off your high horse.

And you don't need to be diamond (or whatever arbitrary rank you'd choose defines "good") to have game knowledge, asshat. So how about instead of being a pretentious fuck, actually support an argument instead of failing to discredit someone else's.
Amen to that brother.
You do know that Samsung White Rengar is a thing Riot? You know the skin he got in honor of Dandy's use of him in worlds.
in S4 worlds by Dandy from SSW
he got banned in 2014 worlds, the tank meta wasnt for him, and pre-season 6 is the assassin meta (basically). rengar is now coming out of the bush and i know lcs will start to play him
mountain (i think) picked rengar in first day at worlds the game where incarnation first picked veigar... rengar ganked once and killed veigar and thats all he did, nothing else
watching mountain playing rengar after that one gank was just really sad to watch

> [{quoted}](name=UltraScept,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=6AiNRqv8,comment-id=000600000000,timestamp=2015-12-30T19:18:58.972+0000)
>

>

> 
> How many times have you seen that shit being played in the LCS, LCK, or LPL?

He has this weird skin... SSW rengar ring any bells? No? Only the greatest jungling ever seen? Come on dude watch dandy shit on everyone in every game of last years championships then tell me he was never played.

> [{quoted}](name=UltraScept,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=6AiNRqv8,comment-id=000600000000,timestamp=2015-12-30T19:18:58.972+0000)
>
> Do you know how long Rengar has had his current oneshot kit?
> 
> Two years.
> 
> How many times have you seen that shit being played in the LCS, LCK, or LPL?

During that two years he was extremely popular in Season 3, then in Season 4 and 5 we had changes to the jungle that lowered his clear time and brought about a tank meta.

We are now in a marksman focused meta. Killing the marksman once again wins your team the game. Assassins are in a completely different spot power wise than before, with zero changes to their kits.

arguably though rengar and talon did get a late game but with the sweeper true sight and pink ward trinket removal.

and with crit chance more easily available it gives them damage as well, because while ADC gotten better items assassins gotten better items as well as they can make good use of most of them.

if there was just something telling me rengar had ulted I knew I had to be more cautious, as it stands though mid/late game he can have so much ms that the ''!'' above the head is irrelevant because once you see it it only takes half a second longer before he can be on top of you.

> LCK,

Historically Rengar's been quite popular in the LCK. At the start of the year when everyone was playing Lee/J4/Rek a lot of Koreans were picking Rengar as well.

>jungling is subpar and is only sort of reliable at level 6, and even then vi is a much more reliable champ.

Bingo, you nailed head on why he's not abused.  That doesn't change the fact that his burst hits far too fast and slowing him down so that his burst takes between 1.0 to 1.5 seconds to pull off would go a long way towards making his kit a lot healthier.

He's not abused because he has glaring weaknesses that people for some reason never take advantage of in soloqueue.  If he was truly broken, his glaring weaknesses would be ignored, like when Darius was literally picked every game in season 5 worlds.  Darius has long been considered awful because he gets kited so hard by coordinated teams and is easily camped.  But because he was so broken, he was still a top tier pick in competitive.

Rengar, however, is not.  Whether you like him or not, he's not broken.  Maybe more difficult to deal with now that pink trinkets and sweepers have been removed (I wanted them back too), but not as broken as people are saying.

It also doesn't help the rengar hater's argument that his soloqueue stats are very....mediocre.  51% winrate across all elos plat+, and this is where people start actually 1 trick ponying Rengar.  He is by no means broken, and making his burst take over a second would be a pretty significant gut to him across higher elos, because they have much better reaction timing and Rengar will quite literally become worthless if he cannot burst fast enough.

The problem with Rengar is that his combo is literally too fast for human reflexes.

The average player needs 0.3 seconds to react against any visual stimulus. 
Some professional athletes may achieve a reaction time of 0.1 seconds if they are talented. 
Many designated hitters in MLB need to be able to react so quickly in order to hit 90 miles per hour balls.

However, Rengar is capable of assassinating his target in .01 seconds. A person with that fast reflexes will be able to see, comprehend, and react to something coming at him/her at 900 miles per hour. That is beyond human capabilities.

Even a Rengar who is not fed can delete an ADC in less than .3 seconds. With all his MS buffs late game and the fact that he can use his abilities before or during his jump, unless he is spotted with a pink ward first, there is literally nothing anyone can do to stop him besides using scripts.

Rengar's combo essentially has no counter play outside of spotting him with a pink ward. He is too fast to react against, and even if someone manages to act in time, most CCs have animation time. By the time the CC actually lands, the ADC would be dead regardless.

One can argue that other assassins such as Talon or LeBlanc is capable of doing the same thing. However, the key difference between them and Rengar is that Talon or LeBlanc needs to get there first and then kill you. Rengar does it on the way.

When Talon jumps on a target even if from his ultimate, a fast-fingered Leona might be able to stun him before Talon lands his Q. Likewise, a good Sona will be able to CC LB mid dash and the damage will not land.
But with Rengar, even if you do somehow stop him mid air, the ADC is probably already dead.

Rengar is either going to be overpowered or underpowered. He will either kill the ADC, or he won't.

that 0.01 seconds timer is from FIRST DAMAGE INSTANCE to death.
Not from when the      !       appears
Not from when the jump starts
But from when the midair bola hits to when the target dies.

Big difference. VERY big.
And lets not forget that ping is a thing in this game, I play with an average 80 ping which is decent but by the time my game catches up I am dead.

Correct me if I'm wrong, but wasn't Talon's silence taken away because he was too oppressive when fed? Rengar should also fall into this category then. He needs to be changed. There is no counterplay for any adc when you can barely react fast enough even with a ! above your head.

Even a Vayne who happens to have a pink ward must put down the ward, find him, and then condemn him before she maybe has the chance to live.

Talon's silence was taken away because it lacked any any all counter play. **It was borderline retarded if you think about it. 
**

You had an AD assassin that doesn't even need to be fed to do a good amount of damage on top of a dash that increases the damage he deals to them PLUS a silence, what is an AP mid or AD caster suppose to do even if they are fed or he's fed? It was literally impossible to fight back against a Talon that had you in his sight if you relied to heavily on abilities.
Pink ward+Carry bodyguard(CC, not fucking Soraka...).
Would you say Tahm Kench would be a good bodyguard for a carry?

> [{quoted}](name=TurquoiseYoshi,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=6AiNRqv8,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2015-12-30T18:49:57.358+0000)
>
> Would you say Tahm Kench would be a good bodyguard for a carry?

Yep.
Now I'm gonna wait for you to mention that video of Lucian dying in Tahm Kench's stomach...
yeah, that's one time, lmfao. You can't base his entire character off of that, or the 0.01 second kill, or whatever. They're probably mostly in Diamond-Challenger where people are extremely good, not to mention they were probably fed as fuck and that off-screen kill was a glitch(he'd have died before he was eaten if it weren't).

What about challengers like Double Lift and Sneaky getting assassinated by a Rengar that literally walks through their whole team? What about bronzes who still get assassinated by Rengar because they aren't coordinated enough? So if Rengar is too good in both challenger and bronze what elo is he balanced at?

> [{quoted}](name=BluePolarizer,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=6AiNRqv8,comment-id=0002000000000001,timestamp=2015-12-30T22:24:36.820+0000)
>
> What about challengers like Double Lift and Sneaky getting assassinated by a Rengar that literally walks through their whole team?

That was teamwork. They gave him a ton of speed boosts to stack with his ult and Youmuu's, letting him run like hell. Thresh also reacted too fast and E'd before Rengar was there even with his speed boost.

>What about bronzes who still get assassinated by Rengar because they aren't coordinated enough?

Well that's their fault. You can't base balance off of Bronze.

> So if Rengar is too good in both challenger and bronze what elo is he balanced at?

Oh, don't give me that bullshit. Bronze you can't base balance off of because they just suck, and Challengers know how to work with their team. Saying Rengar's OP because Challengers can work with their team is like saying Malphite is OP because even Bronze know how to followup with AOE or a Yasuo ult.

Linking video clips of assassinations says nothing about how the game went before that point... if you feed ANY champion they will be over powered.  I have yet to be in a game where Rengar was too hard to handle.  Pink ward and a well timed juke neuters his damage, just like Zed or any other burst champ exhausting him takes him down a notch.

zed has delayed burst, zed cannot burst you down within 0.01 second, his ult can more over be cleansed, as shown in a video a pink ward may not even be that much of help, and that video was of a tournament player who were fully cooperating and prepared for rengar yet still failed.

compared to leblanc and zed rengar lacks counterplay in the form of items, QSS can screw zed over, banshee's veil can screw leblanc over, neither of those items screw over rengar.

the time it takes for rengar to apply his damage makes allot of supposed counterplay obsolete.

@AyRe CoNteMpT, I can't suggest anything without breaking him, rengar his kit is flawed, he either runs around one shotting someone with the opponent being able to do anything about it without insanely good reflexes or he is just a sad kitty unable to do his job properly which is why I personally think a rework would be best for him,

Take a champ with cc.  You didn't do that? Buy a pink.  He's fed so he can kill you before you can react?  Buy a zhonyas.  You're an adc?  Buy a ga.  Really it still doesn't work?  Try a youmuus and running away.  Or just stand in the middle of your team so they can kill the rengar or cc him. 
Also, some champs really should be risk vs. reward.  If you do it perfectly and they mess up, maybe you should win the fight.  If you misplay maybe you shouldn't. I don't think that rengar's kit is as black and white as you think it is.
So the answer is pick a champion with cc, buy pink, zhonyas, ga, yonmus. Sounds simple!

Zed's ult should not be able to be cleansed.

Aside from that, this is an assassin working as intended - you can show all the video's of super-fed rengars you want; the last one especially it was a rengar with a lulu speed buff and ghostblade and no one reacted as he ran through them.

Assassins need to be able to insta-kill their targets; if you want a champ that just does a bunch of damage and doesn't kill you'd be better off with a Mage for the team utility or AOE or a fighter for the extra tankiness and CC.

> [{quoted}](name=TeemoJenkins,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=6AiNRqv8,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-12-30T16:44:41.591+0000)

I have yet to be in a game where Rengar was too hard to handle.  Pink ward and a well timed juke neuters his damage, just like Zed or any other burst champ exhausting him takes him down a notch.

Rengar has a wide difference in win rate by experience. You simply don't play against any decent Rengars. He also doesn't need to be "fed", he can get his gold by simply farming enough to get enough stats to assassinate, especially since your idea of "fed" is just a Rengar with a ton of kills and no farm which isn't exactly that bad.

As Le bl, katarina main

And from time to time zed player

Le bl can delete you in 0,2 seconds in 30 diffrent ways I am consistently doing this...

Feed zed can perform insane burst if fed without even ulti. WEQAA but really fast... and I dont know when exatly they use second w so put it somewhere in the combo  

Those 3 assassins dont need 2 seconds to perform their burst

Thing with rengar is all of his damage line ups in 0.01 second . While rengar player use their abilites in a **0.5 interval** I hope people do understand that 
You can time all your abilities to hit in the same time with him. 
People arent doing that ..because there is really no point in doing that but yeah sometimes all the abilties randomly line up and they you have this 0.01 on shots 

I am kinda fine with rengar because if you shut him down he is one of the most useless champions in the game 

Besides Talon can perform the same thing with ghostblade and his short stealth. ON top of that he brings insane burst to an entire team

just pink ward the spear.

The damage is only dealt when he hits you, just use your skills when he reveals himself (jump start). Rengar is fine and that's the only thing he can do, it used to be much worse when you didn't have the exclamation mark & he only revealed after the jump animation ended (much lower time to react).

Take away {{champion:107}} ability to one shot fine, but then your going to need to buff him again. 

Seriously, one shotting your ADC is all {{champion:107}} can do, while champions like {{champion:238}} and {{champion:7}} have great wave clear, much more mobility, and a safer split push than {{champion:107}}.

{{champion:107}} is seriously a poorly designed cluster fuck of a champion that Riot has no idea what to do with. No matter what they do with {{champion:107}} , he will always have one stupid mechanic Riot can't do anything about without nerfing him into the ground.

I had an idea of perhaps turning Rengar into a snaring monster, but is built tanky. Think Rek'sai and her knockups.

>LeBlanc
>Waveclear

you can only pick one

That takes away entirely from the character built by his lore and appearance / VFX.
These are why i play rengar..
Trapping things seems pretty hunter to me. And I really doubt Rengar's human trainer jumps out at people 100-0ing them in .000001 seconds.
This is true, but a utility tank is NOTHING like what rengar should be. 2 very different extremes.

Really Rengar was one of the top junglers last year but he was built as a tank. Mostly because people were still salty at his rework, and no one really found an effective way to one shot, so they just played him as a utility tank.
